BEACON® AMA Starter Kits: Mid-December 2014 Update
Continued great work by the sales team and channel partners for the last couple of weeks! Since our last update, six starter kits have been sold, bringing the total to 202 BEACON AMA starter kits deployed in the United States!
As a reminder, customers who are interested in deploying a BEACON Advanced Metering Analytics (AMA) starter kit with more than the standard amount of ORION® Cellular endpoints may work with their sales representative to discuss pricing for an expanded starter kit.
BEACON AMA Starter Kit Sales:
12/04/2014 - 12/16/2014
Please contact Cindy Kransler if you have any questions.
New! Utility Distributor Seminar and Sales Technical Conference Toolkits
Two new utility seminar/conference toolkits are available for distributors and Badger Meter sales representatives. These toolkits include everything you need to prepare and present a seminar and/or conferece to prospective customers. Each toolkit contains a checklist of "to-do" items, an invitation (print and/or email version), an agenda, thank you notes, table tent name cards, evalution forms, sign-in sheet, and the City of XYZ presentation. All files are in Microsoft Word and/or PowerPoint format and can be customized for each presentation.
Download the Distributor Seminar Toolkit on the Badger Meter extranet. Download the Badger Meter Sales Technical Conference Toolkit on the Badger Meter extranet.
Please contact Judson Luke if you have any questions.

2015 Customer Product Training
The Training Group is pleased to announce the dates for the 2015 Customer Product Training (CPT) classes. There will be three classes next year.
May 12-14, 2015 August 18-20, 2015 October 13-15, 2015
Dates are also listed in the “Highlights” section on the front page of the Badger Meter website. Please also visit the Customer Product Training page for more information and to view and download the Training Flyer and Registration Form. Please forward this information to any of your interested customers. They will need to fill out the registration form and send it along with payment to Kelley Johnson. Kelley can be reached at 800-876-3837 ext. 16165 or via email at kjohnson@badgermeter.com.
Please contact Kelley Johnson if you have any questions.

Utility Case Studies Needed
Do you have a customer who would be willing to share their experience with a Badger Meter product? We are looking for case studies/success stories to share externally. Ideally, the application, challenges and solutions are needed to tell a compelling story. Please send information or ideas to Briena Jacob at bjacob@badgermeter.com.
